Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3

This page is still under construction

summary: One Move Is All It Takes
title: One Move Is All It Takes
description:
by Sol_Morales707

After that one fight that got them both into trouble, Katsuki Bakugou and Midoriya Izuku were drawn closer, advancing to the warm status of “friends”. So forth until it all felt back to normal. They still argued sometimes, but they’ve kept it unscratched and even.

Until one day during class by Katsuki’s careless hand. A single move.

Deku’s Birthday Bingo – BakuDeku Card – Friends to Lovers

Words: 1812, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of Deku’s Birthday Bingo 2019

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Explicit Sexual Content, Plot What Plot/Porn Without Plot, Hair-pulling, Rough Oral Sex, Oral Sex, Blow Jobs, Deepthroating, Cumshot, Facials, Mildly Dubious Consent, Dirty Talk, Light Manipulation, Emotional Manipulation, Foot Jobs, Coming In Pants, Hand Jobs, Frottage, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Friends to Lovers, Bathroom Sex, Masturbation in Bathroom

summary: I see some people saying that the ice guy from the Libetation Army could be Natsuo. Making the fact that Dabi possibly being a...
body: I see some people saying that the ice guy from the Libetation Army could be Natsuo. Making the fact that Dabi possibly being a Todoroki even more interesting. But what if it’s not Natsuo, I mean the outfit is pretty gender neutral. What if it’s Fuyumi instead!

reblog.comment: I see some people saying that the ice guy from the Libetation Army could be Natsuo. Making the fact that Dabi possibly being a Todoroki even more interesting. But what if it’s not Natsuo, I mean the outfit is pretty gender neutral. What if it’s Fuyumi instead!

summary: Urameshi vs. Toguro is just the retro version of Deku vs. Muscular
body:
Urameshi vs. Toguro is just the retro version of Deku vs. Muscular

Proof:

  • Green-haired protagonist who has a great power passed down from his mentor vs. big guy who can manipulate his muscles

summary: Horikoshi better not give him a fucking sixpack then 😤😤🙏
question: Horikoshi better not give him a fucking sixpack then 😤😤🙏
answer:
OH BRUH LISTEN IF HORI GIVES TOMURA A SIXPACK I WILL FLY TO JAPAN TO SMACK HIM MYSELF, HOW CAN ONE MAN MISUNDERSTAND HIS OWN WORK SO COMPLETELY, TOMURA CLEARLY HAS SOFT TUMMY ENERGY???

blog.name: makethiscanon
blog.title: Make This Canon
blog.description:
Reader-Insert Queen.
Follow me for story updates and sneak previews.
https://archiveofourown.org/users/WhenSarahSmiles/

summary: I really like that HC you just posted. Maybe do it for Todoroki? Or is that annoying?
question: I really like that HC you just posted. Maybe do it for Todoroki? Or is that annoying?
answer:
It’s not annoying! And I’m not 100% certain which headcanon that was. I’m guessing it was the kidnapped S/O one, but I’ll write the living with Todoroki HC too for fun.

Living with Todoroki

  • He keeps a photo of his family on the mantelpiece but Endeavor’s face has been neatly cut out.
  • His favourite indoor clothes are his grey sweatpants. He swaps into them as soon as he gets in and lounges on the couch because he can.
  • If he sits around for too long, though, he gets really fidgety. He still isn’t used to relaxing.
  • He has an unofficial pet cat. He fed it once and now it visits every morning and meows at the back door until he caves in.
  • He has to shop for cat treats once a week. The cat is spoiled. It’s gotten chubby.
  • He likes small, spontaneous displays of affection. He’ll wrap his arms around your waist while you’re cooking, or hold your hand while he reads a book.
  • Physical affection is a major part of why he enjoys living with you. It’s easy for him to get lost in bad memories but one kiss or a small touch from you grounds him.
  • He’s a tidy person but is still up for making blanket forts. He read about them in a children’s book and feels robbed.
  • Same goes for eating raw cookie dough. You have to hold the bowl, though. He was so excited the first time he tried it that his left side cooked the batter by accident. Still, tasty cookies.
  • Take your shoes off at the front door. The house might be carpeted but some habits die hard.
  • He makes a great bath buddy. When the water starts getting cold he heats it up instantly with his quirk. He really enjoys baths, especially when you join him. Bubble baths are a particular favourite and he’ll stay in until he goes wrinkly.

Todoroki finds out you’ve been kidnapped

  • He finds out from a text off Midoriya. You work together at the same agency and although they are trying to keep it under wraps, Todoroki has to know.
  • He texts back one word: ‘okay.’
  • He very calmly gets up off the couch, turns the TV off then goes very still.
  • He doesn’t move.
  • He still doesn’t move.
  • Tendrils of smoke begin to rise from his left side.
  • Todoroki calls the fire brigade on his way out, flames spiralling around him with the intensity of an inferno. The house is ablaze. It doesn’t matter. He can only think one thing: They’re going to pay.
  • No public transport is fast enough for his liking. He curses.
  • He plans to single-handedly storm the villains’ lair and get you back.
  • Only after many panicked text messages from Midoriya does Todoroki agree to team up with the agency. Shared Intel means a better success rate.
  • Following strict orders, he wanders into the villains’ lair, an abandoned warehouse, by himself and through the front door. His face is enough to make the villains nervous so they don’t dare run away once they see him.
  • He waits in silence. He’s patient.
  • Midoriya speaks into his ear through a headpiece, telling him they’ve got you out safely.
  • Todoroki puts the headpiece in his pocket. He stops being patient.
  • The windows at the very top of the warehouse shatter outwards. People in the street notice jagged ice sticking through them.
  • Todoroki stays away until the medics have checked you over at the scene. Midoriya texts him once you’re free.
  • As soon as he spots you, he strides up to you and grabs you in the tightest hug he dares. He doesn’t say a word. He can’t stop trembling.
  • He stays at your place for a while. It has nothing whatsoever to do with his place being fire damaged.
  • It does a little bit.
  • But also he has nightmares of what could have happened and waking up next to you helps him calm down. He hopes his presence has the same effect for you.

I hope you enjoyed! And please feel free to message me any other requests. I absolutely love writing them~

summary: Thank you so much for that Tamaki headcannon! I loved it! 👏🏻👏🏻 (And I totally know what you mean. Don’t look up hawks. I spoiled...
question: Thank you so much for that Tamaki headcannon! I loved it! 👏🏻👏🏻 (And I totally know what you mean. Don’t look up hawks. I spoiled tamaki for myself the same way. and it eventually led to hawks and you can’t go back. So now it’s chaos in my head waiting for the anime to catch up).
answer:
I’m so glad!! Honestly, yours was only the second ever headcanon I’ve done. It was super fun to write and I hope you gimme more requests in future!

Also lol, I definitely think I’ve spoiled Hawks a little just by following BNHA people on here–damn you dashboard–but fingers crossed I don’t get major spoilers before they air.

*dodges spoilers like mines in a mind-field*

summary: You know what? I don’t care if Dabi being a Todoroki is a sellout. It’s a fun gimmick to have a villain be the son of the new...
body: You know what? I don’t care if Dabi being a Todoroki is a sellout. It’s a fun gimmick to have a villain be the son of the new number one hero. And I don’t think it’s pandering to have a trope that’s been done before, because tons of shows do dumb tropes for the Drama of it all and that’s fine

summary: A mugger decides to go for some random person with big macaw wings as they walk home. This is possibly the worst mistake he’s...
question: A mugger decides to go for some random person with big macaw wings as they walk home. This is possibly the worst mistake he’s made ever.
answer:
This reminds me of this image and I love it.

You’re a small time thief.

You steal purses and wallets; you don’t want to hurt people, you just want cash.

It seems like it should be easy- it’s raining, those wings are slowing your mark down, so you casually trail after them, waiting for a more secluded area, because there’s always one.

You don’t notice the big behemoth on the rooftops, too quiet to be natural, watching the both of you.

And when you reach out to touch this person, you sure as shit don’t expect to literally be yanked off your feet by your neck.

And when you look and see that it’s All-Might holding you, staring you down (in the background you can hear your would-be mark screaming), you realize:

You’ve fucked up.

summary: I also like how flashback-All For One says something similar to All Might’s catchphrase. All Might always says “mou daijoubu,...
caption:
I also like how flashback-All For One says something similar to All Might’s catchphrase.

All Might always says “mou daijoubu, watashi ga kita”  whereas All For One told Shigaraki Tomura (Shimura Tenko at the time) “mou daijoubu, boku ga iru”. Both could be translated as “It’s all right now, I’m here” but with a different feeling.

Watashi ga kita translates more literally as “I have come”, so it’s All Might saying things are all right because he’s arrived to save the day.

Iru is the word you’d normally use to say that a person is somewhere – not that they’ve arrived, just that they’re in a location (or even just that they exist: for instance kyoudai ga iru means “I have siblings”). So what All For One said is more along the lines of “I’m here with you.”

[Text reads:

(Shigaraki) “YOU!! I HATE YOU!!”

(Flashback AFO) “It’s all right now. I’m here.”]
